post.body: The Chocolate Marshmallow ones taste nothing like chocolate marshmallow. HERSHEY'S FAIL.
I have a cookbook from Louisiana with squirrel recipes. Also, it tells you how to cook these: http://www.nutria.com/site.php
I did that once, only it was with medical-grade THC. Hijinks then ensued.
http://weblog.signonsandiego.com/news/breaking/index.html
We were there last Friday with @whithonea and his fam. I'm still recovering.
Awesome. Powers is fantastic.
Eh. PS3 is out. Expensive and there don't seem to be a lot of good games for it.
Both. Had an old Xbox with a handful of games, so that's why I'm leaning toward the 360.
The $ whore that snapped a 19 game winning streak. Does that make it better, or worse?
It was, actually.
R/T for the PM crowd: my Top 10 Guilty Pleasures. http://tinyurl.com/6nrqve
What's this? What's this? Chocolate MARSHMALLOW Hershey's Kisses? I shall try one and report back!
Squirrel - the Other Grayish-Brown Meat.
Should I eat these croutons? Or give them to the squirrels? OR...use them as bait for the squirrels, and catch and eat them?
Unless you are an actual, by-God Cowboy who goes on cattle drives, you have no business wearing a cowboy hat.

I love it when I curse in a Tweet and lose a follower. Fart! Dookie! Pee pee! Ding ding! Weiner! Bottom!
Ba dum bump BUMP! Baaaaaaah DUMP!
I'M MISTER GREEN CHRISTMAS MUTHAFUCKAS, I'M MISTER SUN. I'M MISTER HEAT BLISTER, I'M MISTER HUNDRED AND MUTHAFUCKING ONE.
I see that people are using various Rankin-Bass characters for their Twitter pics.
You can also follow DadCentric on Twitter. @dadcentric. Looks like Jack White was wrong - I CAN be a pimp and a prostitute too!
Just noticed something: DadCentric (www.dadcentric.com) is in the top 6 on Alltop's Dad Network Page Site Thingy. http://dads.alltop.com/
What's with all these people skulking around my cube? Quit skulking. You look like a bunch of Van Heusen-shirt-wearing Jawas.
Listening to one of my managers interview a guy from Blackwater. Fighting the urge to scream "dirty fucking mercenary!"
Going Blu-Ray player huntin' today, now that they are all Teh Cheap. As for game platform, thinking it'll be an Xbox 360.
39 degrees outside? DAMN YOU SNOW MISER!!!!!!
I'm R/T this since you all were too busy to read it on Xmas: http://tinyurl.com/7vm5o7
Happy Boxing Day. Or as we call it here in the States, "Christ I'm hungover, where is the goddamn Advil?
Other than the fact that Staples Center calls Heineken Premium Beer, being at the game was an absolute blast. Merry Xmas! Boston sucks!
Not on Xmas, Celts.
The Laker Girls in tight Mrs. Claus suits. God bless us, every one.
Showtime!
Santa is sending me to Staples Center to watch the Lakers beat the Celtics!
New MamaPop post: Die Hard is the best Xmas movie ever! http://tinyurl.com/7vm5o7
Now I'm wrapping Christmas gifts for the dog. Like he celebrates Xmas. He's Jewish.
Hey! Can you people please stop with the"Santa is over Greenland" stuff? I CAN'T DEAL WITH THE PRESSURE.
The profanity that spews forth when I try to wrap presents would make Quentin Tarantino blush.
A & P has provided me with the world's smallest turkey, already in the oven, nice and hot. Oh damn! Guess what I forgot!
Twas the day before Xmas, and all through the house/PetCobra was running around like Godzilla was coming, shrieking and flailing his arms.
